Text:
Thanks for this! These two rars contain the products:

http://www.wordofpromisebible.com/old-testament-audio-bible.php

http://www.wordofpromisebible.com/new-testament-audio-bible.php

If you're a true christian, you'll seed this and share with the rest of the people who want it. If you don't want to seed it indefinitely, at least set yourself a goal to seed for a year or to seed until your ratio is 15:1. Don't hit and run (dl and immediately remove the torrent), but rather give back more than you had received.
